group_1.narration: "Today's business@will be coming to an end shortly..."

group_1.textLeft: Phew... I managed to get it all.

group_1.textRight: Amazin'...!
In just 15 minutes you got all the decorations@we need!
Urara, are you used to doing this kind of thing?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
Back in my hometown I was part of a street@performing duo,
and, by extension, was the MC for events@and programs,
so for smaller events I kinda know what's generally@needed.

group_1.textRight: Heeh...@[chara:304401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304401:motion_400][chara:304401:lipSynch_1]Wait, you mean you're some kind of celebrity?
Why'd you never tell us?!

group_1.textLeft: It was just local work,
and I quit when I was still a novice, so it's not really@worth talking about.
Well, we're done shopping, so let's get all this back.

group_1.textRight: The farewell party's at Yuna's, so we'll leave@alla bags there.
The party decorations'll look fine and all,
but like, you're good not buying food or drinks?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I forgot...!

group_1.textRight: The store's about to close, right?@How 'bout we hit up the convenience store?

group_1.textLeft: That's fine, but...@The farewell party's tomorrow,
so we'll prioritize decoratin' first, then tomorrow@mornin' we'll go shop.
'S only a little, but we'll cut costs!
I'll make a note so we don't forget what to buy@tomorrow!

group_1.narration: • Sweets in a box@• 500ml of PET bottle juice

group_1.textRight: Why a box?

group_1.textLeft: It's a secret.

group_1.textRight: For juice, ain't it cheaper gettin' cartons or@2L PET bottles?

group_1.textLeft: That's a secret too,[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:lipSynch_1][chara:103601:mouthOpen_1] smile!

group_1.textRight: That's annoying, but I'm kinda worried...
Ah – Hikaru wants cake and Yuna's ice cream@on the list too!

group_1.textLeft: Roger that!

group_1.textRight: Ah, if we're doing a whole cake, wouldn't ordering@one in advance be better?
But there ain't gonna be any stores takin' orders@at this hour...

group_1.textLeft: That reminds me, the staff earlier...
...mentioned there's a store that can take sudden@orders.

group_1.textRight: That store – issit in Futatsugi too?!

group_1.textLeft: I'll look it up on the net, so gimme a sec!
Ah, there it is!
We can make an online order and pick it up@tomorrow!

group_1.textRight: You did it, Urara.

group_1.textLeft: Smile!

group_1.textRight: Then Hikaru wants an order.

group_1.textLeft: Got it!
Just screenshot the order receipt, and saved...
I'll send the shopping list to you guys too.

group_1.textRight: That helps!
Tomorrow we'll meet up at Yuna's, then come shop@more!

group_1.textLeft: Roger that!

group_1.textRight: Mornin' Urara!

group_1.textLeft: Morning. Where's Ranka?

group_1.textRight: She's stoppin' by Juri's place, so she wants us@to go on ahead.

group_1.textLeft: Got it.

group_1.textRight: I'm the one who asked you to decide what the party@would entail...
But having you help this much too.@I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Yuna...

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: I, um...
(I would like to receive...Sakuya's memento...)

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I won't be able to help today, either...
I'll be back once the student council work is over,
so I will call everyone here this evening and we will@begin the farewell party.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, sure...! I understand.
(Again, I couldn't say it...)

group_1.textRight: Alright, we're off to go shoppin'!
Excuse me, I'm here to pick up the cake I ordered!

group_1.textLeft: Could you show me your order receipt?

group_1.textRight: Let's see, I just show you my smartphone screen,@right?
.....[wait:1.0][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]I-it's not here...?!
I forgot my smartphone at Yuna's house...!
[chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]E-EHHHH~~~?!
